title: This is so boolshit
body: Dear peasants of the internet, I just did a boolshit kahoot in which 2 of the questions had a positive multiply by a negative and equal a positive I would just like to vent my rage on the internet because I am a twelve year old %%%got with no life outside of the internet. Don't try to talk shit to me because I am a child behind a computer screen with a keyboard and I will rage but if I saw you in real life I would just be silent and not say anything and just walk away because I am a scared weak little shit with no friends.

replies.body: I have a friend called Fred. Fred said "I like have sex with you me now?". Come and embrace Fred
So no one wants to be my friend T-T
Say goodbye to Willy, because I'm pretty sure almost everyone except a minority formed by widows is friends with that guy.
Im honestly unsure why so many people want to hook up with a penis. He'll probably violate you during the night you know. i {{champion:86}} tee that.
It's not violation if it gives elation
The third option is pretty much every man's relationship with himself and I don't think many people would trade their manhood for a LoL friend request
